Name: Ghost Bear Dominion
Description: An amalgamation of the Free Rasalhague Republic and Clan Ghost Bear, the Rasalhague Dominion is a blend of the political, military and cultural styles of Inner Sphere and Clan societies. Founded in 3060 as the Ghost Bear Dominion the new state was isolationist by inclination, only waging war against the Draconis Combine and Word of Blake due to external factors
ReputationStatements: Your insistence on opposing the Bear has not gone unnoticed, mercenary.  However, I am generous.  You can begin to make amends with this batchall.
Your craving for battle is well known.  Perhaps this batchall will satiate your desire?
The Bear has faced you in battle before, and you are a competent warrior.  Take up this batchall and perhaps we can find a more common purpose.
You are an unknown to us.  Prove yourself on the field of battle with this batchall, and we may have further use of you.
You have assisted the Bear in the past, and I would like to offer you this batchall so that we can continue this relationship.
Hello again, friend to the Dominion.  We offer you this batchall in recognition of our kinship.
Greetings, my brother.  You have helped me so often, I almost look at you as a member of my own family.  I have this choice batchall for you, if you are interested.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done Commander.  The satisfactory completion of this batchall will benefit the Bear, and I have transferred your c-bills as agreed.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You clearly lacked the strength to complete all the objectives. However, I will provide a partial payment for your partial completion, so long as you do better next time.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your weakness is an embarrassment, and you have failed to honour the terms of the batchall in any significant way.  You receive nothing from me, other than my disdain.
